about_the_game:
In collaboration with the publishing house BILDNER Verlag, we present "The Official Guides" for Railway Empire 2.

The Compendium contains all the necessary information to build up a successful railway company and your own rail network. Filled with information on people, infrastructure, merchandise management and management, the compendium accompanies all steps of the game. You will learn everything from building your first station and laying the first tracks to taking over competitors and buying up factories and farms. In addition, you will find helpful reference chapters on research, controls and achievements.



You can find your Railway Empire 2 guide in your Steam Apps game folder: \steamapps\common\Railway Empire 2\guidebook

Or access this folder from the properties of the game in your library, choose "local files", then "browse".
